Texts.Chs: 把^orange;冶炼炉^reset;带给这名科学家。（位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;）
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Blast Furnace^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 如果你能在^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;中制造一个^orange;冶炼炉^reset;并将它带给我，来帮助我分析它的话，我会十分感激你的，也许还会给你一些奖励。
Texts.Eng: If you can build a ^orange;Blast Furnace^reset; with a ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it here, so I can analyze it, I would prove most grateful and perhaps reward you.
